nodes.html: RM2Target is a comprehensive database for targets of writers, erasers and readers (WERs) of 9 RNA modifications. We collected target genes with different evidence types as follows:

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Validated: 2,114 WER-target associations were experimentally validated by WER perturbation experiments from 927 published literature.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Binding: 523,141 WER-target associations with binding evidence were predicted from high-throughput sequencing data such as CLIP-seq, RIP-seq, ChIP-seq and Mass Spectrometry.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Perturbation: 1,094,398 WER-target associations were inferred from WER perturbation followed by high-throughput sequencing such as RNA-seq, MeRIP-seq and Ribo-seq.

nodes.html: In RM2Target, you can obtain the following information:

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks
All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Basic information of WERs and target genes, such as gene ID, gene symbol, gene type, alias symbols and functional description.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Detailed information of WER-target associations, such as binding information, detect methods, cell line annotations, perturbation direction and downstream effects at expression, translation, alternative splicing, stability or modification level.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: • Abundant annotations of target genes, including RNA modifications, RNA-associated interactions, and related disease information.
